label: 王直
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: The Chinese buccaneer [(? - 1559)]...who at the time had his headquarters in Japan, in that old wakō lair, Hirado, and availed himself of a comfortable base of operations in the Gotō Islands (p. 250).  [倭寇、平戸、五島列島]
